item.title: fixing code style with style
item.description: Key Topics OpenAI API Function Chains Validation Prompt Engineering Abstract In my university computer science course, we have an extensive code standard. We are provided with a linter that is a bash script and identifies most errors, but it doesn’t cover every case, such as embedded constants and local variable definitions. In this project, I will focus on embedded constants and cover 1. identifying these, and 2, fixing these. The strategy I use to solve this issue can be applied to anything similar.
